data.description: popup menu of perl commands in systray
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Win32::Tray would be a module that brings you a tiny Win32 app that
    sits in the windows tray and pops up a menu that list perl commands
    that are implemented as package subclasses of Win32::Tray (so it's
    really a C++ DLL plus a Perl package). Basically it lets you invoke
    commands written in Perl in 2 clicks from your desktop.

    Someone suggested Win32::Systray instead of Win32::Tray, i have no
    preference. If someone has a better idea for the name, i'd be
    willing to hear about it.
